  9. Date æ—¥æœŸè°ƒç”¨äº† toJSON() å°†å…¶è½¬æ¢ä¸ºäº† string å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼ˆåŒ Date.toISOString()ï¼‰ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¼šè¢«å½“åšå­—ç¬¦ä¸²å¤„ç†
  10. å…¶ä»–ç±»å‹çš„å¯¹è±¡ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬ Map/Set/WeakMap/WeakSetï¼Œä»…ä¼šåºåˆ—åŒ–å¯æšä¸¾çš„å±æ€§

å…·ä½“äº‹ä¾‹ï¼š è§

å¦‚ä½•ç”¨ js å®ç° JSON.stringify

// æ•°æ®ç±»å‹
const isBase = (val) => val === null || typeof val !== "object";
const isTypeObject = (val) => typeof val === "object";
// Object.prototype.toString
const toString = Object.prototype.toString;
const isBoolean = (val) => toString.call(v) === "[object Boolean]";
const isBigInt = (val) => toString.call(v) === "[object BigInt]";
const isSymbol = (val) => toString.call(v) === "[object Symbol]";
const isNull = (val) => toString.call(v) === "[object Null]";
const isString = (val) => toString.call(v) === "[object String]";
const isUndefined = (val) => toString.call(v) === "[object Undefined]";
const isNumber = (val) => toString.call(v) === "[object Number]";
const isFunction = (val) => toString.call(v) === "[object Function]";
const isArray = (val) => toString.call(val) === "[object Array]";
const isObject = (val) => toString.call(val) === "[object Object]";

var escRE = /[\\"\u0000-\u001F\u2028\u2029]/g;
var escMap = { '"': '\\"', "\\": "\\\\", "\b": "\\b", "\f": "\\f", "\n": "\\n", "\r": "\\r", "\t": "\\t" };
// prettier-ignore
var escFunc = function (m) {return escMap[m] || "\\u" + (m.charCodeAt(0) + 0x10000).toString(16).substr(1);};

function stringify(value) {
  if (isNull(value)) {
    return "null";
  } else if (isNumber(value)) {
    return isFinite(value) ? value.toString() : "null";
  } else if (isBoolean(value)) {
    return value.toString();
  } else if (isTypeObject(value)) {
    //  å¯¹è±¡ç±»å‹
    if (isFunction(value.toJSON)) {
      // .toJSON
      return stringify(value.toJSON());
    } else if (isArray(value)) {
      // æ•°ç»„
      var res = "[";
      for (var i = 0; i < value.length; i++) {
        res += (i ? ", " : "") + stringify(value[i]);
      }
      return res + "]";
    } else if (isObject(value)) {
      // å¯¹è±¡
      var tmp = [];
      for (var k in value) {
        if (value.hasOwnProperty(k)) {
          tmp.push(stringify(k) + ": " + stringify(value[k]));
        }
      }
      return "{" + tmp.join(", ") + "}";
    }
  }
  // éå¿…è¦çš„ç©ºå­—ç¬¦å»é™¤
  return '"' + value.toString().replace(escRE, escFunc) + '"';
}

// var test_data_1 = { name: 1, age: 2, grades: [1, 2, 3] };
// console.log("deep", stringify(test_data_1));
// console.log("json", JSON.stringify(test_data_1));

const data = {
  name: { grades: [1, 23, 4] },
  age: 2,
  other: { name: { grades: [1, 23, 4] } },
};

console.log("deep", stringify(data));
console.log("json", JSON.stringify(data));
